Uses of Class
software.leonov.common.progress.ProgressMonitor

    • Uses of ProgressMonitor in software.leonov.common.progress

      Methods in software.leonov.common.progress that return ProgressMonitor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.addProgressListener(ProgressListener listener)
      Adds the specified listener to handle ProgressEvents.
      static ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.create()
      Returns a new ProgressMonitor with the minimum and maximum step size set to DEFAULT_MIN_STEP_SIZE and DEFAULT_MAX_STEP_SIZE respectively.
      ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.setMaximum(long maximum)
      Sets the maximum value.
      ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.setProgress(long count)
      Sets the progress count, publishing a ProgressEvent if necessary.
      static ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.withConstantStepSize(long stepSize)
      Returns a new ProgressMonitor with the specified stepSize.
      static ProgressMonitor ProgressMonitor.withMinMaxSize(long minStepSize, long maxStepSize)
      Returns a new ProgressMonitor with the specified minimum and maximum step size.
